page.title: 13Clubs in Creeting St. Mary
page.content: THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE This group meets once a month on a Wednesday evening to exchange skills, listen to interesting speakers and have a pleasant chat and cup of tea. OVER SIXTIES CLUB This group was formed by the W.R.V.S. to provide a social outlet for the senior citizens.They meet once a fortnight on a Tuesday afternoon. YOUTH CLUB Meetings for teenagers are held on Monday evenings in the village hall. SOCIAL CLUB The bar at the village hall is available to members at Sunday lunchtime. They also run monthly. MOTHERS AND TODDLERS CLUB. This meets on Wednesday mornings in the village hall. LOCAL HISTORY GROUP CREETING ST. MARY CONSERVATIVE ASSOC.
